/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the middle of the street, looking towards a large apartment complex that dominates the background. The apartment complex, with its red brick facade and numerous windows, stands out against the overcast sky. The street itself is lined with trees and lampposts, adding a touch of greenery to the urban landscape. On the left side of the street, there's a construction site, hinting at ongoing development in the area. The colors in the image are somewhat muted due to the overcast sky, creating a somewhat somber atmosphere. Despite this, the image provides a detailed view of the street and its surroundings, offering a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing.
